title: InterAction member activities in Jordan
tags: who is doing what and where - 3w - 4w - 5w

bites.title: Count of project_name
bite: Food Distribution to Orphans and Poor Families (Jordan)

bites.title: Count of project_description
bite: Provide monthly food rations to orphans and poor families
Provide emergency food for families suffering from hunger and to refugees
Assist refugees and poor and needy families on a monthly basis provide for basic needs
Give disabled and the hearing impaired a chance to live life with dignity
Distribute winter coats and sweaters to orphans, refugees and poor families annually

bites.title: Count of activities
bite: Provide food and non-food items, rent, utilities payments and other items to refugees and poor and needy families
Provide wheelchairs, walkers, glasses, hearing aids, devices, supplies and equipment to the hearing impaired and disabled
Distribute winter coats and sweaters to orphans, refugees and poor families annually

bites.title: Count of sectors
bite: Economic Recovery and Development|Food Aid|Humanitarian Aid

The largest project_description is Provide monthly food rations to orphans and poor families with 1 reports followed by Provide emergency food for families suffering from hunger and to refugees with 1 reports.

The largest sectors is Food Aid with 1 reports followed by Food Aid|Humanitarian Aid with 1 reports.
The largest donors is with 3 reports.
